define.name: nof_pools
define.doc: trunk module might be represented with pools in certain architectures, this number represents the number of pools currently supported for this device. each pool has a constant amount of members.

define.name: max_nof_members_in_pool
define.doc: the maximal amount of members that a pool can contain.

define.name: max_nof_groups_in_pool
define.doc: the maximal amount of groups that a pool can contain.

define.name: spa_pool_shift
define.doc: bit shifts to describe the pool of a trunk in a System Port Aggregate

define.name: spa_type_shift
define.doc: bit shifts to describe trunk type in a System Port Aggregate

table.name: pool_info
table.doc: this table contains the information per pool of trunks

value.name: max_nof_members_in_group
value.doc: maxmimal number of members in a group in this pool

value.name: max_nof_groups_in_pool
value.doc: maximal number of groups in this pool

value.name: pool_hw_mode
value.doc: mapping to the actual value the HW needs to get to represent given pool mode

define.name: consistant_hashing_small_group_size_in_bits
define.doc: size in bits of small groups in c-lag

define.name: smooth_division_max_nof_member
define.doc: max number of member is trunk group with smooth division as PSC

define.name: smooth_division_entries_per_profile
define.doc: logical number of entries dedicated in the HW per SMD profile

feature.name: multiply_and_divide
feature.doc: is Multiply and Divide PSC supported

feature.name: multiple_egress_trunk_sizes
feature.doc: device is supporting multiple modes for sizes of egress lags

numeric.name: nof_lb_keys_per_profile
numeric.doc: number of lb keys per Egress trunk

numeric.name: dbal_egress_trunk_index_multiplier
numeric.doc: multiplier size for mapping dbal key EGRESS_TRUNK_INDEX in dbal table TRUNK_EGRESS_MC_RESOLUTION

numeric.name: dbal_entry_index_divider
numeric.doc: divider size for mapping dbal key ENTRY_INDEX in dbal table TRUNK_EGRESS_MC_RESOLUTION

numeric.name: dbal_entry_index_msb_multiplier
numeric.doc: multiplier size for mapping dbal key ENTRY_INDEX msb in dbal table TRUNK_EGRESS_MC_RESOLUTION

numeric.name: size_mode
numeric.doc: HW mode relevant for group size

numeric.name: invalid_pp_dsp
numeric.doc: invalid pp dsp that should be connected to invalid out port for egress trunk

sub_module.name: graceful
sub_module.doc: data regarding graceful modification of trunks

feature.name: allow
feature.doc: allow changing lag in an atomic action in the device's local scope

define.name: first_hw_configuration
define.doc: hw value to indicate first configuration is currently used

define.name: second_hw_configuration
define.doc: hw value to indicate second configuration is currently used
